points: Led the development of a new feature for standardizing delivery nomenclature across the platform—allocating tasks to other engineers as needed, and managing release and rollout
Assisted engineers with their new features by completing web-specific tasks using React and TypeScript

Implemented a new CLI command to create front end applications with the ability to opt in or out of optional features on creation using TypeScript, greatly reducing the work needed to make a new front end app
Designed and implemented a bot for auto-labelling GitLab merge requests based on changes made, streamlining merge request workflows
Created a homepage using React to have a one-stop landing page for all of our team's various documentation
Debugged and finalized a feature to mock backend responses for Cypress Tests, freeing them from potential API issues, making test runs more reliable
Led the implementation of a new, highly requested feature for resetting client data, developed using Vue
Adapted UX designs from concept to code, making necessary changes as per updated project specifications during the development process
Tested i18n translations and implemented quality-of-life fixes for other languages, ensuring a better user experience for a wider range of users
Participated in design meetings to decide on creating or modifying API calls required to develop upcoming features
Participated in the migration from jQuery to Vue, updating the main dashboard page of the company website, enabling improved integration with the rest of the platform
Fixed both functional and visual bugs across the platform, improving user experience
Developed several enhancements to the site as per client request to improve clarity and overall user experience
Created unit tests for new and existing code, greatly improving test coverage across the platform
Analyzed developer tickets and composed automatic test cases in Python to test new changes
Oversaw automated Jenkins jobs and fixed failing test cases, improving to 90%+ success rate
Migrated Jenkins jobs required for deployments by rewriting them with updated functionality in Groovy
Developed a script to automatically run basic smoke tests for a build whenever requested with a comment in a PR
Created a Jenkins job to monitor the status of testing machines and report errors to ensure machines are being used effectively and have maximum uptime
Led a meeting to transfer Jenkins knowledge I had learned throughout the term to newer employees
Planned, designed, and composed scripts with Python to automate product tests, saving over 5 hours per week
Implemented a Python script for updating all the team’s machines to the newest version to ensure automated tests were never running on outdated builds
Led a meeting to demonstrate the capabilities and features of an upgrade script to finalize it before integration
Optimized testing by deploying new machines that were used exclusively for our team’s testing
Experienced working with source control and project management software in an Agile environment
Collaborated with co-workers to serve guests and clean the hall in a timely fashion
Consulted with customers and tended to any needs or concerns they may have had
